video.title: Animal Mechanicals
video.synopsis: In this series for preschoolers, the Animal Mechanicals use their amazing ability to transform to solve challenging problems.

episodes.synopsis: On Turbo Bean Island, the mission is to plant the frisky Turbo Bean. Rex transforms to dig a hole; Mouse transforms to chase the bean.
episodes.title: Turbo-Bean Trouble

episodes.synopsis: The mission is to help the bunnies on Bunny Boomer Island build their Boomer, but squirrels block the path between the bunnies and the Boom Blocks.
episodes.title: Bunny Boomer Island

episodes.synopsis: The destination is Cow Castle Island. The mission is to help the Cow Castle get to the grassy meadow on the other side of the Pop-Rocket Cornfield.
episodes.title: Cow Castle Hassle

episodes.synopsis: The destination is Whale Plane Island. The mission is to build a runway long enough for the Air Whale to land on.
episodes.title: Whale Plane Island

episodes.synopsis: The destination is Dino Mountain Island. The mission is to take out a cog that is stuck between the Dino's teeth.
episodes.title: Dino Mountain Island

episodes.synopsis: On Chickadee Island, the mission is to help Momma Chickadee hatch all her eggs. Mouse chases after a runway egg. Rex lifts the egg into the nest.
episodes.title: Chickadee Island

episodes.synopsis: The destination is Beetle Buggy Island. The mission is to unblock a traffic jam. Unicorn transforms to get a bird's-eye view of the track.
episodes.title: Beetle Buggy Island

episodes.synopsis: On Pop Apart Penguin Island, the mission is to build a bigger igloo for the penguins. Komodo transforms to saw ice blocks out of an ice mountain.
episodes.title: Pop Apart Penguins

episodes.synopsis: The mission is to put together a jigsaw puzzle. Rex transforms to lift the heavy jigsaw pieces. Unicorn transforms to fly after a lost jigsaw piece.
episodes.title: Jigsaw Shark Puzzle

episodes.synopsis: The mission is to find the missing Bell Bots on Bell Bot Island. Komodo transforms to unscrew the bolts in which the Poppa Bell Bot is caught.
episodes.title: Bell Bot Island

episodes.synopsis: The destination is Elephant Train Island. The mission is to move the rock-blocks that are blocking the train track.
episodes.title: The Elephant Train

episodes.synopsis: The mission is to help the pinballs on Mechana Pinball Island play their game. Rex pulls the knob; Sasquatch stretches to push the flipper button.
episodes.title: Mechana Pinball Island

episodes.synopsis: The destination is Giraffe Crane Island. The mission is to find more mechana-logs. Komodo transforms to saw more logs.
episodes.title: Giraffe Crane Island

episodes.synopsis: The destination is Glitterfish Island. The mission is to find the lost Power Bubble. Mouse transforms to catch the crab that has stolen the bubble.
episodes.title: Flying Glitterfish Island

episodes.synopsis: The destination is Racing Snail Island. The mission is to ride the racing snails, but a cog caterpillar is blocking the track.
episodes.title: Snail's Pace Race

episodes.synopsis: The mission is to make a bat cave bigger. Komodo transforms to knock down a rock-block wall. Rex transforms to move the heavy rocks out of the way.
episodes.title: Mechana Bat Island

episodes.synopsis: The mission is to change the hippos' worn-out bumpers on Hippo Hovercraft Island. Mouse transforms to chase the hippos into the pit stop.
episodes.title: Hippo Hovercraft Island

episodes.synopsis: The destination is Volcano Balloon Island. The mission is to stop the balloons from popping. Mouse transforms to sees what is popping them.
episodes.title: Balloon Volcano Island

episodes.synopsis: The destination is Dragonfly Island. The mission is to rescue the crashed dragonfly and get her flying again.
episodes.title: Mechana Dragonfly Island

episodes.synopsis: The destination is Mechana Parrot Island. The mission is to help the Mechana Parrot sing her beautiful song again.
episodes.title: Mechana Parrot Island
